tuningTable.name: apidb.Statistics
tuningTable.sql: create table apidb.Statistics&1 nologging as select taxa.project_id, taxa.organism, genes.gene_count, transcripts.transcript_count, cdss.cds_count, proteins.protein_count, sequences.sequence_count, sequences.total_sequence_length, orfs.orf_count, ests.est_count, assemblies.assembly_count from (select project_id, organism from apidb.GeneAttributes union select project_id, organism from apidb.SequenceAttributes union select project_id, organism from apidb.EstAttributes union select project_id, organism from apidb.OrfAttributes union select project_id, organism from apidb.AssemblyAttributes union select project_id, organism from apidb.OrfAttributes) taxa, (select project_id, organism, count(*) gene_count from apidb.GeneAttributes group by project_id, organism) genes, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) transcript_count from apidb.GeneAttributes ga, apidb.TranscriptSequence ts where ga.source_id = ts.source_id and ga.project_id = ts.project_id and ts.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) transcripts, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) cds_count from apidb.GeneAttributes ga, apidb.CodingSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) cdss, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) protein_count from apidb.GeneAttributes ga, apidb.ProteinSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) proteins, (select sa.project_id, sa.organism, count(*) sequence_count, sum(length(seq.sequence)) total_sequence_length from apidb.SequenceAttributes sa, apidb.NaSequence seq where sa.source_id = seq.source_id and sa.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by sa.project_id, sa.organism) sequences, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) orf_count from apidb.OrfAttributes attrs, apidb.OrfSequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) orfs, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) est_count from apidb.EstAttributes attrs, apidb.EstSequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) ests, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) assembly_count from apidb.AssemblyAttributes attrs, apidb.AssemblySequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) assemblies where taxa.project_id = genes.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = genes.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = transcripts.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = transcripts.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = cdss.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = cdss.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = proteins.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = proteins.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = sequences.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = sequences.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = orfs.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = orfs.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = ests.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = ests.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = assemblies.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = assemblies.organism(+) order by taxa.project_id, taxa.organism

tuningTable.name: apidb.IsolateStatistics
tuningTable.sql: create table apidb.IsolateStatistics&1 nologging as select project_id, genus, count(*) isolate_count from (select ia.project_id, substr(ia.organism, 1, instr(ia.organism||' ', ' ') - 1) genus from apidb.IsolateAttributes ia, apidb.IsolateSequence iseq where ia.source_id = iseq.source_id and ia.project_id = iseq.project_id) group by project_id, genus order by project_id, genus
